ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'You are merely someone bewitched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "You are no more than one of those who have been bewitched,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "You are no more than a bewitched and insane man
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “You are under a magic spell.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "You are only one of those bewitched!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: You are only of those deluded;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Thou art merely one of those that are bewitched;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Thou art but one of the bewitched;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: thou art but of the bewitched;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Indeed you are one of the bewitched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Thou art only one of those bewitched!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "You are only one of those bewitched!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'You are surely one of those bewitched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “You are one of those bewitched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:185]   They said, ‘You are indeed one of the bewitched.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 421 (They said: thou art but one of the bewitched) you are neither an angel nor a Prophet;
